scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build: concurrently "cd server && npm run build" "cd client && npm run build"
scripts.render-build: npm install && npm list concurrently && npm run build
